translations: v．断言，声称：坚定地声明某事为真。
· He avers that he saw the suspect at the scene of the crime.
他断言他在犯罪现场看到了嫌疑人。

sentences.sentence: He avers that chaos will erupt if he loses.
sentences.translation: 他断言如果他失败将会爆发动乱。

sentences.sentence: He avers he will not attend the meeting.
sentences.translation: 他断言不会参加那个会议。

sentences.sentence: Dream, avers, countless people in compiling the dream of frustrations.
sentences.translation: 梦想，从古至今，无数的人们在酸甜苦辣中编制着梦想。
